Class DijkstraRouteService

InitialRouteService, UpdatingRouteServiceClient
public class DijkstraRouteService
extends Object
implements InitialRouteService, UpdatingRouteServiceClient

Dijkstra route service search for a shortest route in the road network using Dijkstra's algorithm.
